name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mass Copy URLs âˆ’ copy all URLs on all tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy to clipboard all the URLs in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,es,e:
It copies to clipboard all the URLs from all the tabs currently open in your browser.
Note you must pin the extension to be able to work with it .
You have to click the pinned icon on your taskbar once and then you will be shown multiple options in popup to chose from.
long.en_GB,en_US:
It copies to clipboard all the URLs from all all the tabs currently open in your browser.
Note you must pin the extension to be able to work.
You have to click the pinned icon on your taskbar once and you will be shown multiple options in popup to chose from.
